title: Cant select anything in the shop
body:
So i can navigate throughout the shop, but i cant select anything. I cant click 'unlock' buttons for champs or skins.

I bought some RP (which seems to be the only thing i can do) to change my summoner name, but cant do anything with it.

Has anyone else had this same issue n if how did u resolve it?

replies.body: Do you lag at all while in game?
